message: I've been wanting to list all of the members on the about page.  What do you all think of this?   We can have a picture, bio, social links etc... and of course if you don't want to be on there that is fine too.
maybe just your online name or something.  This way we can always have a current list of all members.
I'm game. First name, last initial work?
I think for this to work out well, we'll need at least 10 members to agree to have a public bio.
We should bring it up at the meeting

Ok, I found a plugin that uses the wordpress profile.  So just edit your profile at http://www.alphaonelabs.com/wp-admin/ and it will show up on http://www.alphaonelabs.com/about/  - if you are not signed up on the blog and want a profile let me know.
sounds good. can you make me a profile?  'schwendigo' for profile name
@MickChagnet the profiles are user managed.  Once enabled, you can login and change it to whatever you want.  You are enabled as of a day ago.
Thanks. Is this a page I have a login for? Also, joking about Maj. Johnson.
You should... http://www.alphaonelabs.com/wp-admin/ let me know if not
